mapper.select: SELECT n.*, a.name AS admin_name FROM notice n INNER JOIN admin a ON n.admin_no = a.no ORDER BY n.no DESC LIMIT #{perPage} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT n.*, a.name AS admin_name FROM notice n INNER JOIN admin a ON n.admin_no = a.no WHERE n.no = #{noticeIndex}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET status = status - 1, mod_date = NOW() WHERE no = #{noticeIndex}
